question: فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّكَ
answer: Then we will surely produce for you

question: وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ
answer: and surely I will crucify you

question: وَلِتُصْنَعَ
answer: and that you may be brought up

question: تَضْحَىٰ
answer: exposed to the sun s heat

question: فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ
answer: So surely I will cut off

question: وَوَاعَدْنَاكُمْ
answer: and We made a covenant with you
